API reference¶

pflacs means faster load-cases and parameter studies.

  • Premise
  • Calc
  • Parameter

Premise¶

class pflacs.Premise(name=None, parent=None, parameters=None, data=None, treedict=None, vnpkl_fpath=None)[source]¶

Class for creating pflacs data nodes.

Premise is a sub-class of vntree.Node.

Parameters:
  • name (str or None) – node name
  • parent (Node or None) – The parent node of this node.
  • parameters (dict or None) – dictionary of input parameters.
  • data (dict or None) – Dictionary containing node data.
  • treedict (dict or None) – Dictionary specifying a complete tree.
_hdf_fpath¶

Attribute that indicates the path for the HDF5 file.

plugin_func(func, module=None, argmap=None, newname=None)[source]¶

Bind an external Python function as a method of a pflacs tree.

Calc¶

class pflacs.Calc(name=None, parent=None, parameters=None, data=None, treedict=None, funcname=None, argmap=None)[source]¶

Class for creating pflacs calculation nodes.

Calc is a sub-class of Premise.

Parameters:
  • name (str or None) – node name
  • parent (Node or None) – The parent node of this node.
  • parameters (dict or None) – dictionary of input parameters.
  • data (dict or None) – Dictionary containing node data.
  • treedict (dict or None) – Dictionary specifying a complete tree.
  • funcname (str or None) – name of pflacs plugin funcion/module to be used dby this calculation node.
  • argmap (dict or None) – optional mapping for names of function arguments and return values.

Parameter¶

class pflacs.Parameter(name, desc='')[source]¶

Descriptor class for pflacs parameters.

Parameter is used internally by pflacs.

Parameters:
  • name (str) – the parameter name.
  • desc (str) – parameter description.
